item.title: Future Proof Publish SDK Option
item.description: What the Future proof doin? In this post we will examine more in depth what the Future proof Publish option does in the VRChat SDK control panel. This post is a bit technical but I will try to put a simple explanation as conclusion for those of you who only wanted to know what and why. Where is it? If you open your VRChat SDK control panel in unity and go to the Settings tab you will see a “Future Proof Publish” option which at the moment of writing is by default off.
